text: Basi katema kawakatile tama ya jwalakwe, wapite pakasyepela kuntemela. Jwankulungwa jwao jwatite: “Ana ngankuimanyilila yanti baba wenu wajigele kwa jenumanja chilanga chakulumbilila mwa Allah (chakuti tinchim’busya jwalakwejo kukwakwe)? Soni nkaniiwe ayi mwalepele kunchengeta Yusufu. Basi ngangopoka m’chilambo muno mpakana akambe lusa baba, kapena Allah anamule (yakopoka pakungombolasya kun’jigala mpwangajo), soni Jwalakwe ni Jwambone nnope mwa akulamula.”
